ArticleTitle.sentence: Fimbrial phase variation in Escherichia coli: dependence on integration host factor and homologies with other site-specific recombinases.

AbstractText.sentence: Expression of fimA, the structural gene for type 1 fimbriae of Escherichia coli, is phase variable.

event.clue: Expression of fimA, the structural gene for type 1 fimbriae of Escherichia coli, is phase variable.

AbstractText.sentence: Significant homologies were identified between the recombinases which control fimbrial phase variation, FimB and FimE, and the integrase class of site-specific recombinases.
Normal expression of fimA was shown to require the integration host factor (IHF).
